title: Of human rights
creator_contributor_role: United Nations. Film Board, production company
subject_group: Food, Health, Lifestyle, Medicine, Psychology & Safety/Prejudices
Economics, Philosophy, Politics, Religion & Sociology/Civil rights
Economics, Philosophy, Politics, Religion & Sociology/International cooperation

description: An incident involving economic and racial prejudice among children is used to dramatise the importance of bringing to the attention of the peoples of the world the rights of all human beings as set forth in the Universal Declaration of Human Rights.
